name: 王者战车
description: King chariots is a blockchain electronic competitive game, which takes chariots as the main operating body of the game and carries out 5-5 antagonistic competitive games. In the game, there are various types of chariots. From the type of tracked tank to the type of wheeled car, each chariot will carry different weapons and skills. It can be said that the playing methods and tactics of different chariots in the battle are completely different
